vague_description: Determine the optimal combination of circular and rectangular tables to maximize guest accommodation at a science fair, considering space constraints and participant requirements.
detailed_description: In a science fair, there are two types of tables that can be used to display the children’s science experiments. At the circular tables, \param{PosterBoardsCircular} poster boards and \param{ParticipantsCircular} participants can fit around the table to cater to \param{GuestsCircular} guests. At the rectangular tables, \param{PosterBoardsRectangular} poster boards and \param{ParticipantsRectangular} participants can fit around the table to cater to \param{GuestsRectangular} guests. However, each circular table takes up \param{SpaceCircular} units of space while each rectangular table takes up \param{SpaceRectangular} units of space. The science fair has must be able to fit at least \param{MinParticipants} participants and \param{MinPosterBoards} poster boards. If the science fair has available \param{TotalSpace} units of space, how many of each type of table should be set up to maximize the number of catered guests?
target_objective: Maximize the total number of guests catered by circular and rectangular tables
target_constraints: Number of circular tables is non-negative
Number of rectangular tables is non-negative
Participants at circular tables plus participants at rectangular tables is at least MinParticipants
Poster boards at circular tables plus poster boards at rectangular tables is at least MinPosterBoards
Space used by circular tables plus space used by rectangular tables does not exceed TotalSpace
target_parameters: Number of poster boards that fit around a circular table
Number of participants that fit around a circular table
Number of guests catered to by a circular table
Number of poster boards that fit around a rectangular table
Number of participants that fit around a rectangular table
Number of guests catered to by a rectangular table
Space taken up by a circular table
Space taken up by a rectangular table
Minimum number of participants to accommodate
Minimum number of poster boards to accommodate
Total available space for the science fair
